name: zentropy
description: A comprehensive Product Management platform with project workflows, team collaboration, and capacity planning built with Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, and TypeScript. Streamlines product development from planning to delivery.

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run copy-static && tsc
scripts.copy-static: mkdir -p dist/public && cp -r src/public/* dist/public/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev: npm run port:check && npm run build && nodemon dist/server/index.js
scripts.dev:full: npm run port:check && npm run clean && npm run build && echo 'ğŸ” Testing server startup safety...' && timeout 10s node dist/server/index.js && echo 'âœ… Safety check passed! Starting full environment...' && docker-compose up -d && node dist/server/index.js || echo 'ğŸš¨ Server failed safety check - see CLAUDETroubleshooting.md'
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.emergency: pkill -f 'node dist/server' || true && docker-compose restart && npm run build:clean
scripts.quality: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && npm run type-check
scripts.test: node scripts/pre-test-check.js && npm run copy-static && vitest src/ --exclude="src/__tests__/infrastructure/**" --exclude="src/__tests__/ci/**"
scripts.test:quality: npm run test:unit && npm run lint && npm run format && npm run type-check
scripts.test:quality:full: npm run test:infrastructure && npm run test:deployment && npm run test:quality
